\hat Q^-(a+\frac{i(k-1)}{2})
\hat\phi_{E_n}(\vec x; a+\frac{ik}{2}) \biggr] ,

\hat Q^-(0)\hat U(-\frac{i}{2}) ...
\hat Q^-(0) \hat U(-\frac{i}{2})}_{k \,\, times}
\, \hat U(2a+ik)\hat\omega_n\Vert , \nonumber
